law.catch_line: A person may not knowingly engage in vaginal intercourse with anyone whom the person may not marry u...

text.section: A person may not knowingly engage in vaginal intercourse with anyone whom the person may not marry under § 2-202 of the Family Law Article.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a felony and on conviction is subject to imprisonment for not less than 1 year and not exceeding 10 years.
